trans-unit.source: Enable Debug mode: Be careful, this is not advised to enable this mode in production environment!
Formz TypoScript configuration seems not to be included. Please include the "formz" static TypoScript on this page.
The configuration for this form contains at least one error:
This field must contain a valid number.
This field must contain a valid integer.
This field must contain at least one of the following values: %s.
This field must contain a valid email address.
This field must contain a valid phone number.
This field must contain a number with a length between %1$s and %2$s.
This field must have a value between %1$s and %2$s.
This field must contain a valid number.
This field must contain a string with a length between %1$s and %2$s characters.
This field must have the same value as %s.
The condition « %s » has at least one error: « %s ».
